name: Land of the Mage Lords
description:
Survive waves of enemy troops and spells while summoning your own to do battle.

Multiple Ways to Win

In this defense-style game, progress through ten unique levels. Earn more powerful abilities as you conquer each enemy. Access more than fifty spells and troops. Cast anything from a Storm of Lightning to Healing Spells. Summon troops that range from tiny Will O Wisps through Elven Archers to Vampires.

Features

  • 50+ spells and troops
  • 10 unique levels
  • 3 difficulty levels
